name: What's Up? (Tolo)
description:
Hi!

I am a solo game developer who has been developing this prototype I call "What's Up?" for two weeks now. This is my first prototype that I think is really good so now I'm in a dilemma. Should I continue with this game or make something else?

Feel free to try out my game and letting me know what you think of it. It's quite short and has a concept that I think is pretty fun. It's a platformer with a twist. Instead of jumping through the levels you sort of flip the screen and in that way you beat the levels.

If you like it, found any bugs or have any ideas for the game please let me know through the comments below.

Thank you for reading and have fun!
